prod_desc: Charge Axl into battle against the three fearsome brothers!
prod_long_desc:
Play out endless LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ battle scenes as Axl takes on the three ancient Stone monsters to stop them terrorizing Knighton, featuring a rolling monster vehicle with a giant face and chomping jaws, and a rear firing catapult. Includes two scannable shields and three minifigures.
Includes three minifigures: Axl, Roog and Reex.
Features a flexible-wheeled monster vehicle with giant face, two-minifigure cockpit, opening jaws, rear firing catapult, two translucent-blue lightning elements and a shield holder.
Roll the vehicle to activate the chomping jaws!
Load the Gravellers into the catapult and launch them into the air!
Also includes Axl's axe and a chain mace.
Accessory elements include two Gravellers and two shield holders.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents’ permission.
Scan shields for the NEXO Power Bulldozer and Forbidden Power Horrible Hunger. Then power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Measures over 4” high, 8” long and 6” wide.
